text:
@FLOTUS @WhiteHouse @POTUS Have you heard that #benedictDonaldTrump asked Russia & China to interfere with his elections in 2016 & now 2020?

Trump slowed down coronavirus testings & KILLED AMERICAN LIVES.

#CadetBoneSpurs ordered our military to TEARGAS US peaceful protesters.

#VoteBlue
#BidenHarris2020
